Junkyard Shaman.title: The Hermit And The Sea
Junkyard Shaman.about:
The Hermit and the Sea, recorded in Osaka and Busan, marks a shift from Junkyard Shaman’s spoken word collages to a textless, sea-centered sound work. This cassette-only release is built from coastal field recordings, and it's a piece designed to decay, fully revealing itself only as the tape wears down and the sounds merge into an indistinct, eroded mass.



NOTE: This work is not digital and does not include download. It is only on tape, limited to 120 copies, released by Satatuhatta, 2025.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 切ない花
Junkyard Shaman.about:
我が心の中で

切ない花が咲いてる



In my heart

Painful flowers bloom

Junkyard Shaman.title: 残光 - Afterglow
Junkyard Shaman.about: My friend told me she had a dream where I was in a very dark river trying to catch some really faintly glowing things. I thought that in a way that is exactly what I am doing.This is the afterglow of a dream I did not see, but the remains of which still linger on with me many days after.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 懐かしき雪ふりけり
Junkyard Shaman.about: This album is the first thing I recorded after returning from Mokurai tour back to Osaka. I wanted to play my guitar for many months and this is the first time I was able to. To my surprise, I for some reason started to play things I had not done in many years, maybe after moving from Finland. I started to see some of those long winter nights from when I last did something like this, and it made me feel strangely nostalgic. Not in the way that I would like to return to any of it, but in the way that I was half here, half there, 7000 kilometers and 10 years away.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 最果ての景色
Junkyard Shaman.about:
最果ての景色, The Final Landscape, The End of the World. 

I recorded three different albums of music, and this was the only one that I liked. 



Quiet. 

Still. 

Nothing goes on. 

Nothing comes around.

 Everything is. 

Meaningless and quiet. 

The final landscape

Quiet ocean 

of the endless night,

the last of the stars

slowly going out

one by one

without anyone noticing.

trackinfo.title: 果てしない夜の海　The Sea of Endless Night

Junkyard Shaman.title: 운명의 바다
Junkyard Shaman.about:
운명의 바다, 運命の海, The Sea of Fate.



Lately, my life has consisted mostly of two things. Staring at the sea, and accepting my fate as it is. My life is being thrown around by forces larger than my own strength, and there is not much I can do about it, besides drift with it wherever it takes me. 

I am grateful to the sea, for it has given me comfort and a sense of beauty, it has taught me things about this universe that I can never be able to express in any language. It is flowing energy, eternal poetry.



I hope you enjoy this.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 閑心
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Meditations of today, clear and silent mind, not clouded by chaos, not distracted by uncertainty. 

I see the path that I chose at age 5, still unfolding in front of me. Although it was a long time of uncertainty and fog, finally it has lifted and I can see what needs to be done in life.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 雨漏りの心
Junkyard Shaman.about:
雨漏りの心 Leaking Heart

Recorded on a day of heavy rain in Osaka, late April, 2025. 

I let the rain soak my heart and wanted it to come through.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Mountain Path
Junkyard Shaman.about: In search for a peace of mind.

trackinfo.title: Alone at the Edge of the Universe
闇の中からまた新たな闇の波が来る

Junkyard Shaman.title: 海霧
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Only shakuhachi.

海霧　Kaimu, or Jiri, meaning sea mist or fog is a word for haiku poetry. I wanted these peaces to be like small poems, simply breathing, quieting mind, capturing the moment. They carry small fragments of honkyoku and some things I have gathered from playing in nature, imitating shadows dancing or wings of a crow..

trackinfo.title: 空の果ての彼方へ　Beyond the End of the Sky
雨上がり　After the Rain
夢の残り　Remnant of a Dream

Junkyard Shaman.title: 光の囁き
Junkyard Shaman.about:
壁でささやいた朝光

僕が行くべきなら

一緒に行ってくれないか。

どこへ

ぼくもまだ知らない、、、



Morning light whispering on my wall

If I should go

Can you come with me?

To where

I do not yet know...

Junkyard Shaman.title: 残り灰
Junkyard Shaman.about:
残り灰の中より

自分の夢を探してみるけれど

すべての灰が時の風に

散らかせている。



From amongst the ashes

I am searching for my dreams

but everything is being scattered around

by the winds of time

Junkyard Shaman.title: 黙雷
Junkyard Shaman.about: This is the first album by multidisciplinary duo Mokurai. It combines butoh and poetry, sound art and traditional drawing and art, working through both live performances and art exhibitions. This album consists of poetry by Akiyo, and soundscapes made by Jere Kilpinen.
Junkyard Shaman.credits:
released February 20, 2025
            
            Sound - Jere Kilpinen

Poems - Akiyo

trackinfo.title: このみずみのみずのいろ
このみずみのみずのいろ

Junkyard Shaman.title: 餓鬼の世
Junkyard Shaman.about:
餓鬼の世　The World of Hungry Ghosts



In the world of constant desires, only the one who wants nothing is free.





Ambient for shakuhachi, hichiriki and minimal metal percussion, based on the buddhist idea of those who are left wanting in this world and the next.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 名残無
Junkyard Shaman.about:
何も名残がない。



There is nothing left.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 雪崩
Junkyard Shaman.about: This album was an unused part of the music for butoh performances, nevertheless I like it so I decided to share it with you all.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 残骸礼拝
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Album consisting of two recordings. 1st one being Live recording from Environment 0g, Osaka, 8th of December 2024, performed with the butoh by Iori Kinki. The second one being live recording from many years ago in Finland, recorded at my studio space sometime between 2015-2018. Second one comes as a bonus track for those who buy the album. Also very limited CD-Rs available.



"”残骨礼拝”, "Wreckage Worship" from Junkyard Shaman, Jere Kilpinen. Cool! Too cool! It's a two-song album, and the first one has the usual "Japanese Ritual" atmosphere, and features saxophone and voice, so you can feel the "movement". The second song is amazing! He just strums the fuzz guitar. And it's a pretty roaring psychedelic sound! ️I wonder if this is his roots? It makes me think so. It seems to be a live recording, but it's also typical of him not to do anything stupid." Kimihide Kusafuka/K2

Junkyard Shaman.title: 失句集
Junkyard Shaman.about:
これって、昔と将来の詩、無くしたもの、忘れたもの、見つかったもの、失敗したもの、その中で僕の失敗のような人生の一番大切な宝物もある。そうして失句集、シックシュウって呼んでます。この詩はよくライプの時も使いますね、音楽に合わせてやりますけれども、𠮷原幸子の朗読のテープをユーチューブで聞くと、自分の詩もこんな風に保存したくなってきた。

私にはいつも詩人本人の朗読のは何となくすごく大切なものだと思いました。それはこの世の魔法術だね。意識の中に、言葉が新しい世界を作ってるし、その中で誰かほかの人の意識が自分の本音で響くから、素晴らしい体験だと思います。自分はそんなことが出来るかどうかわからないんだけれども、こんな風にも、言葉だけで自分の世界を建てられたかった。



These are poems I have recorded on tape, poems that I use during live performances. Some of them are from my previous books, some of them will be on the next one in the future. 

To me, poets and artists reading their own works has always been a magical thing. Words build up a world inside another persons consciousness, a world within which some other persons true voice is resonating and living inside another mind. I do not know whether I can achieve that or not, but I wanted to have this kind of record of the poetry and my consciousness at this stage of my life. 



I also want to release this in tape or CD, if someone is interested.

trackinfo.title: 現実の肌
trackinfo.lyrics:
この肌の中のぼくは
この肉体の中であり
この骨色の魂は僕の中である。
この罠の中の私は
永遠に逃げてみ来るのに
中々進まなさそう。
この肌の中の肉体が
自らの骨を折れてみる
現実の肌の中で傷を探してみるよ
傷の穴があれば
魂も逃げられるだろう
傷の穴があれば
血の流れとともに
私の魂も逃げるだろう。
この現実の肌の中の僕が
永遠に逃げてみるだろう
この現実の肌の中の僕が
永遠に逃げてみるだろう
この現実の肌の中の僕が
永遠に逃げてみるだろう、、、
もし僕の残り灰の中から
一つのきれいな花も
伸びてきてくれたら
この一生の苦しみも
何か価値があるだろう。

trackinfo.title: 柳
trackinfo.lyrics:
北風の呼吸で柳が折れず
雪の中からまた新たな春が生まれてく

trackinfo.title: 晴れてる日の後
trackinfo.lyrics: 晴れてる日の足跡には雨の日が踏み込んでくる。

trackinfo.title: 古松
trackinfo.lyrics: 古松の記憶の中でまだその柔らかな茎が光に伸びさす。

trackinfo.title: 思想が雑草のようにずっと風に揺られてる
trackinfo.lyrics: 思想が雑草のようにずっと風に揺られてる

trackinfo.title: 海は一つしかない
trackinfo.lyrics:
海は一つしかない
人間が言葉でそれを分けてみるのに
一つの海しかない。

trackinfo.title: 雑草の道
trackinfo.lyrics:
雑草の道を踏み込んでる
心の廃線にて
蒸発されてる夢を拾ってみる

trackinfo.title: 過去の灰の上にはまた新たな雪が降ってくる
trackinfo.lyrics: 過去の灰の上にはまた新たな雪が降ってくる

trackinfo.title: 晴れても　心ゆらゆら　波の音。
trackinfo.lyrics: 晴れても　心ゆらゆら　波の音。

trackinfo.title: また梅が咲く
trackinfo.lyrics:
風で飛ぶ
土地が見えない
葉のように生きてきたのか。
また、梅が咲く

trackinfo.title: 雑草魂
trackinfo.lyrics:
道端の草のように
我が心も
誰も気が付かず咲いてる。

trackinfo.title: 空の雫
trackinfo.lyrics:
空で待ってる雫達は　
海になれることでうれしいかな。
もしかしたら、
僕のように、
自分が消えるのが怖いかな。

trackinfo.title: Avaruusromu
trackinfo.lyrics:
Ajattelen satelliitteja
ja kaikkea sitä metalliromua 
jonka me olemme
ampuneet avaruuteen..
kuinka kaikki ne romutonnit
ajelehtivat kylmässä, etäisessä tyhjyydessä,
omassa yksinäisyydessään
aivan kuten minäkin,
kaukana kaikesta,
ammuttu taivaalle korkein odotuksin,
lähinnä toivoen
että räjähtäisin ja palaisin
ja sitten hylättynä,
kun en räjähtänytkään,
vaan ajelehdin yhä kauemmas ja kauemmas
suuriin
kylmiin
etäisyyksiin.

trackinfo.title: 山の梅の樹になりたい
trackinfo.lyrics:
もしまた生まれ変わったら、
山の梅の樹になりたい。
人の目につかず咲きたい。
ゆっくり　風と踊りたい。
雨の日も
晴れてる日も
すべての日はそのままで
ゆっくり生きていきたい。
どうにもなっても
そのままでいい
自分の秘密を風にしか伝えたくない。
この人生でも
我が夢の中で
無限の梅の見えない花が
きれいに咲いてるよ。

trackinfo.title: 魂の鏡
trackinfo.lyrics:
目が魂の鏡があるべきならば、
我が魂が冷たくて、冬の水たまりの灰色だろう。

trackinfo.title: ある日には
trackinfo.lyrics:
ある日には
波のなき声で目が覚めた。
自分の魂のなき声で
宇宙の美しくて、
穏やかな呼吸を聞こえなくなった。

trackinfo.title: 人生の夏
trackinfo.lyrics:
人生の梅雨が終わって淋しい。
夏に入って、
しばらく遊んでる
赤とんぼのように踊ってる。
踊りの中に
身体の中の悲しみが沁みる。
まだちゃんと始まらない夏の中でも、
盆踊りの記憶の響きもある。

trackinfo.title: 言葉の破片
trackinfo.lyrics:
言葉の破片に刺された心が　
血の雫の色の唄を唄う。
燃えた家の灰の上にも
新しい雪が降ってくるだろう。
冬風がふく　
冬風がふく　
その中で　
言葉の破片が散る。

trackinfo.title: たまりの空
trackinfo.lyrics:
嵐去り
水たまりは空写る
たまりの空は
夢のあい色かな

trackinfo.title: 海の底で
trackinfo.lyrics:
海　　時が無限に経つ。
の
底　　水の流れが聞こえない。
で　
　　　波の音が弱い。

trackinfo.title: 落ち雲の島
trackinfo.lyrics:
落ち雲の島。　
もしできたら、
この落ちてくる雲の破片を
このページに貼ってみたい。
その代わりに
この割れない光線が
しか貼り付けられない。

trackinfo.title: 朝光で美しい、赤い椿たち、冬の子。
trackinfo.lyrics: 朝光で美しい、赤い椿たち、冬の子。

trackinfo.title: さみしい夜
trackinfo.lyrics:
この宇宙の響きがゆっくりきえる。
自分の中の宇宙も少しずつ冷えてゆく。
蝉が弾く音の中で、私が生まれた時の叫びがある。
蝉が弾く音の中で、私の最終の息の音もある。
総ての春の中で、秋の寂しさがある。
私の中でも、まだ生まれてこない君のさみしさもあるよ。
それから、我々の寂しさは永遠に響く。
我々が生まれた前から、
この総ての寂しさもう決めてあったよ。
逃げられないので、耐えることしかない。
一緒にこのさみしい夜を乗り越えよう。

trackinfo.title: 黙雷
trackinfo.lyrics:
遠くの雷の音
もう魂の奥までに滲んでたかな。
いつか、
お互いが去る
このはかない夢の中に蒸発する。
同時に生きてきたことの不思議さ、
割れた現実のの破片の痛みさ、
時で溶けてることが　
まだ　
今　こにいる
美しく光ってる。
降ってきた灰が
血の雫に約束したこと
雷が遠くに去っても
もっとももっともつよくなり。

trackinfo.title: 静粛の叫び
trackinfo.lyrics:
この静かな夜の静粛も僕には
ずっと窓から
溢れてくる叫びのように
聞こえてる。

trackinfo.title: 夢を釣り
trackinfo.lyrics:
詩を探す　　　　夢釣りみたい　
この世の果てまで　　　　　次の世のも　
すべての雲が空から　　　　　　　　落ちてくるまでに　
この夢を追う。
涙のすべてが　　　空から　　　　降ってくるまでに
この一緒の夢を
　　見続けてよ。

trackinfo.title: 秋分の日
trackinfo.lyrics: 秋分の日。空も秋の空。心も秋の心。

trackinfo.title: 夏の雨
trackinfo.lyrics:
突然どこかから来た　
雨が上がった後のにおいは　
夏のにおい。　
もしかしたら、
この雨が夏の時は降るのを忘れた。
そうして今日は、
誰も見えないと思ったら
やっと降れた。

trackinfo.title: 夢の中の人
trackinfo.lyrics:
夢の中に出会った人が
目が覚めたらどこに行くのか。
自分のために消滅したら、
悲しすぎるだろう。

trackinfo.title: もし僕は君の夢だったら
trackinfo.lyrics:
冬風には　さみしいハウルが聞こえてくる　
幽霊たちがハウル　
世界が雪に埋められる　
人生は夢に埋められる　
沈んでゆく。　
この人生は誰かの夢しかないのか。　
もし僕は君の夢だったら、
まだまだ起きないのままで
残ってほしいよ
消えるのが怖いから
もう少し
雪の中に眠ろう
春が来る日までに
残ってほしい。

trackinfo.title: 夢の樹
trackinfo.lyrics:
目が覚めても
夢がまだあふれてくる
感情がずっと夢のままである
感情が深海のように
そこまでに見えないよ
ずっと
虹色の霧の中で迷ってるように
　　覚めたのか
知らない。

森の中で　道が消えたように
ずっとぐるぐる回っていく
私の中で
夢の種がある
頭から茎が出てくる
夢の茎が見えない速さで樹になる。
私の涙がその樹の水、
私の望みがその樹の土地。
夢の樹が段々伸びてくる
青空まで伸びてゆく
まだまだ
覚めたのか
一旦
我々も人間だった
まだ覚えてるのか。
今は夢の跡の
段々消えている残響しかない。

trackinfo.title: 風に散る
trackinfo.lyrics:
我が意識が薄くなるよ。
私の中に、残り物が減る
冬の初雪のように　君の言葉のように、、
心の中で君の言葉がまだ響いてる　。
僕ははだんだんこの風に消せられてる。
自分でも気が付かないはやさで　
風に消せられてる
砂の山のように。

何処か遠くから。。。
もう波の音が聞こえてくる。
それが聞こえないかな。
私たちの時間はずっと
風と波にに消せられてる。
私たちの人生の残り時間が
灰のように
風に散る。

私たち
お互い様は
夢のように
薄くなって
段々消えてゆく。

この一生中で会えて嬉しい。
もしまた生まれ変えたら、
その次の人生でも
私を探してくれないか。

Junkyard Shaman.title: 時間でほどいてくるすべてのもの
Junkyard Shaman.about:
I am getting better

 at losing things

 I am getting better

 at forgetting

 I am getting better

 at disappearing.

trackinfo.title: 時間でほどいてくるすべてのもの

Junkyard Shaman.title: 夢の余韻
Junkyard Shaman.about:
我が心の中で

この誰も見てないすべての

夢の余韻がまだ残ってるよ。



All these dreams

that no one saw

are lingering on my mind.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Haihtuma
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Haihtuma, Finnish for Evaporation.



This is something I recorded today, after spending a couple of days thinking of transience of everything, changes, and my life. Many changes appear to happen slowly when you are living your daily life, but when you are cut off of it and then suddenly put back few months later, everything has suddenly changed almost beyond recognition. I knew it was coming, but I did not expect it to happen yet. 



What was mine is now evaporating. 

What comes after will be for somebody else. 



haihtuma、フィンランド語って蒸発っていう意味です。



これは今日録音した瞑想で、この大阪帰った時から色々な変わったことを見て、人生の無常なことを反省したことの作品です。日常に生きてたら、人生は中々変わらなさそうだけど、しばらくに離れると、全部は突然もうわからないぐらいに変わってきたような感じです。これも、いつか起きるのを分かったのに、こんなに早く起きるのを思わなかった。



私があったことはもう蒸発されゆく。

これからのことは誰かほかの人のことだろう。

Junkyard Shaman.title: 秋の舞踏
Junkyard Shaman.about:
羽島古民家再生工房の秋の舞踏のイベントの音源です、

最初の曲は宇野裕太さんの時、二つ目は彼と金亀伊織さんとのセッションの時。全部そのままでライブで録音したものです。

This is live recording from Autumn Butoh event at Hashima folk house, first one is as played with Uno Yuta, second one was joined by Kinki Iori. Everything as it was played, no cutting or editing.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 夢の海
Junkyard Shaman.about:
The Sea of dreams, little by little falling deeper into myself, melting into my subconsciousness 

Deeper 



Deeper



Disappearing.





Music for solitude and sleepless nights.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 灰雪の愛
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Work of lo-fi ambient and poetry, various shorter poems in Japanese. In my mind, this kind of sound is always connected deeply to snow, darkness and beautiful light of winter afternoon.



 I hope you enjoy it.

As I am doing all my music now without any aid of computers, the volume level might be slightly lower than your average edm bangers, but I believe you are all wise and considerate people who can committ to the music you are listening to enough to turn the volume up a tiny bit, or even better, make your environment more quiet.

Quite often, especially lately, I have been thinking of words by Yamashita Nobuko, an experimental film maker who I played with in few events. She spoke about the contrast between film and modern world, how everybody wants to have huge, bright screens that show you everything in super HD all the time, but her work is dark, small, hard to see.. it won't get any bigger, you need to get closer. You need to make the effort. I loved that, and her works.

 You do not need to see all of the world all the time.





Download comes with selected photographs.

trackinfo.title: 過去の灰には  また新たな雪が降ってくる。
降ってる初雪の美しさの中で もうひらひら散る花びらの寂しさがある。

Junkyard Shaman.title: Seasons in the Sky
Junkyard Shaman.about:
This is my 5 seasons. 

It might sound different if I would have been priviledged enough to have an access to a classical orchestra or even a group of friends and enough time to work in peace, but that is not my reality, so as always, I worked on it alone and without "proper" equipment. I think in the end it made it better. My life is a life of natural flow and rhythm. 

It is also a life of liminality and changes. In my mind there are two worlds. That of Japan, which has the natural, cyclic sense of year, where at every season something beautiful blooms and comes to life, but also perpetually dies in order to give birth to something beautiful and new. The other one is the nature of Finland which still lingers on in my memories, that in which the life is short and death is long, spring and summer are brief sparks of life that slowly decay into darkness and cold, silent seasons of death. But within that death, there is also beauty and life. The gravity of a silent snowflake as it falls down in the dark night, the patience of the pine trees as they wait for the spring sun to make the snow heavy enough to melt and let it fall off to the ground...the perpetually repeating cycles of life. 



Rebirth. 

Something my body and mind also go through each year. The rhythm and flow of nature. The big, beautiful loop that has always been the base of my expression.

 I use loops, because they are the most natural thing, repeating, but never remaining exactly the same, spiralling out, changing unnoticeably, until they become something completely different altogether... that is the natural rhythm and flow of my music.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 風の舟

Junkyard Shaman.title: 黙花
Junkyard Shaman.about:

Album for shakuhachi and metal percussion, recorded in Osaka, Japan, May 2024.

Poems without words. 

Silent flowers that bloom in the night when no one is watching.

Junkyard Shaman.title: There's a Fire Escape in the Sky
Junkyard Shaman.about:
The sky is on fire and the oceans evaporate.

The last birds sing somewhere 

among the burnt skeletons of a forest. 

In the desolate landscape of rust

I lie underneath an upturned wreckage of a boat

and listen to the distant echoes of my dreams

Hallucinating my future.

All alone

All life

All going quiet...

A composition of flesh and blood

Slowly decomposing into mud and soil.

There is a fire escape in the sky

But the sky is on fire and there is no escape.

trackinfo.title: But The Sky is on Fire and There is No Escape.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 밤 하늘에서 별이 떨어진다
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Recorded in Busan today, after a sleepless night after returning from my three day trip of playing live in Seoul.

Recorded live in front of an audience of one person. 

Ambient dreams for sleepless nights.



 As my computer broke down completely I am aware that the volume level is below the normal expectancy of a modern audiophile, but that is also just one more reason for you to be more quiet when you listen to it. 



Mainly I will focus on playing live in the future though. So if you want to hear new music, come see me live.





밤 하늘에서 별이 떨어진다

From the night sky, the stars come falling down.



Download of the album comes with few bonus photos and videos of the trip.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 夢の森
Junkyard Shaman.about:
自身の中の

夢の森へ

もっと深くへ

迷ってゆく

さっきあった道が

もうない。

今からの道がまだ作られてない。



The Forest of Dreams

Recorded straight to tape on 18th of May, 2023 in Osaka, Japan. 



Last night in my dreams I was trying to find my path through the forest I used to know in my childhood, but it had changed within me throughout the years and I did not know the way.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Drifter
Junkyard Shaman.about:
This is an album of meditations for shakuhachi and metal junk. I do not know what my future holds, but I know right here, right now, I am the happiest and most grateful I have ever been in my life. Things are not easy, but still, right now, in the middle of this burning chaos, I am happy in a melancholic way.

I want to thank everyone who makes it possible for me to exist the way I do.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 不生　The Unborn
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Released by Satatuhatta, 1st of January 2024.



This is an album of my zen buddhist shakuhachi practice. It connects the industrial world and nature, metal percussion and bamboo, brought together by human body, human spirit.



Excerpt from the liner notes;

"...my path of blowing zen is that of the Unborn Zen. It has no strict limitations, it has no schools, no intention to attain anything from it, it has no intention of becoming better or achieving some higher end; it is just sound. Accompanied by a self-made metal percussion instrument, it is the sound I want to hear existing in this world of endless separate forms, and all the way within it, lies the reality of the Unborn Mind.



I grew up in the very back end of a Finnish countryside, surrounded

by rusty, broken cars and industrial machinery my family members used for parts. From very early on, I grew to love the sound of metal and glass, wood, stones, the rural and industrial soundscapes of machines and nature entwined together during the field work.



My first experiences of making music were of screeching the sides of a broken cars with sharp sticks, breaking glass bottles underneath our shed and just existing with the sounds surrounding me. For some reason, I always felt like my silence, my presence in space, was active part of being within the entirety of it. I was there, be it in the forest or at the abandoned sauna or at the edge of a field or river, and I decided to do nothing. I did not want to stain it with myself, as it was perfect just the way it was."

-Jere Kilpinen / Junkyard Shaman





I will get my copies later and will sell them mostly on live shows, so find yours through Satatuhatta or different distros. 

satatuhatta.bandcamp.com/album/the-unborn

Two live recordings of performances with butoh artist Iori Kinki. First one recorded at Marcos Nostalgy, 5th of February 2023, the second at Environment 0g, 20th of August 2023. 



I prefer performing with butoh artists, because I feel like my music has been more influenced by their art and my own woodblock prints, than any other musician or music. Especially with Iori, I feel like he is a perfect avatar for the music, the flesh of my bone sounds, reaching out into the space. I have loved every single time we have got to play together and look forward to everything in the future. 



On the second performance I only used the metal sculpture outside Environment 0g, shakuhachi, and some random pieces of junk metal and ceramics I had brought with me.

Junkyard Shaman.title: ふたりで
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Recorded 29th of April, 2023.



I wanted to give this to you,

But I feel like it is too sad

too worn down

too broken

a shrapnel of a heart,

too small

to be given as a gift



but I promise 

that one day

I will be able to make something beautiful

out of all this,

something worth listening to,

something worth looking at

something beautiful..

some day,



for you.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 空がもう消滅されたのに、それを知らないのか
Junkyard Shaman.about:
This is a work of sound poetry that shows the link and process in between visual art, poetry, music and performance quite well. The other day I had a conversation with a friend, which inspired me to do a set of prints. 



Experimenting with those prints inspired me to write a poem, which again evolved into further print. I thought of using that as a sort of mental notation for the live show yesterday, record that and put it out. I also recorded the poem and used it during the live performance.



I did record it, but I realized I messed it up. Nevertheless, the poem on the tape, and the final soundloop used in the performance were still there, so I began this work from where yesterday's performance ended up. 

Download comes with photos of the prints.
Junkyard Shaman.credits:
released April 8, 2023
            
            Jere Kilpinen - music, prints, poetry, recording and mixing, artwork, well, everything as usual.

trackinfo.title: 空がもう消滅されたのに、それを知らないのか
trackinfo.lyrics:
空がもう消滅されたのに、
それが気が付いてないのか、
すべての世界はもう燃えたのに
それが見えないのか。
この錯覚がついに消え去ったら
我がどこへ行くのか。
この夢から覚めたら
また新たな夢が来るのか。
永遠の静かな部屋で
人生の残響が響くのか
この人生のすべてが消えちゃったら
さみしいことじゃないか。。。
いつか
私がもう消えた後で
この体からきれいな花が伸びさしてるのか。

空がもう消滅された、
それを知らないのか
空がもう消滅されたのに、
それが感じられないのか
空がもう消えたのに
それをわからないのか。

Junkyard Shaman.title: 自分の魂を清めますように。
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Recorded on one take in a rainy Saturday afternoon in Osaka, Japan, 17th of December, 2022. Made in order to try to cleanse my soul of all the mud of self-doubt, grief, loneliness... 



I found this tuning originally by accident by randomly downtuning my acoustic guitar without thinking, then struck a chord and instantly knew there were no accidents. I have been using it ever since, as it appears to most precisely fit my soul.



大阪の雨の日には一行で作ったアルバムで、自分の魂を悲しみ、さみしさと自己不信感の泥より清めますように。



このチューニングって、初めて偶然にアコースティックギターを無意識でチューニングして、コードを叩いたら、絶対偶然じゃないのを分かりました。そこからこの同じチューニングをよく使います。自分の気に合う感じです。

trackinfo.title: 私はこのままで、私だけ。

Junkyard Shaman.title: 円
Junkyard Shaman.about:
２０２３年の3月24日、自分の此花ガランの個展の最終日にはこのライブがありました。日本に移住したの時先前オープンしたばかりの此花ガランを偶然に見つけて、あのスペースで自分の最初の日本のライブをやったので、現代の場所の最終日でもまたライブができて何となく大事なことのように見えた。それで有難いです。

永遠に土師さんにお世話になって、今の活動のすべてがあの偶然に開けたドアから始めたのをハッキリ見えるからね。



CDでこれと前にリリースをした京都の大粒の泪で年末に録音したライブが入ってます。

On 24th of March, 2023 at the end of my solo exhibition at art space Konohana Garan in Osaka, I had this sound performance. 

As Konohana Garan was a place I found by some strange just as it had begun, and where I played my first shows in Japan, I was really honored and grateful to play there on the final night of it's current form. I am forever grateful for Haji Kiyoharu and Konohana Garan, as all my current activities spawned from various small accidents and coinsidences, all of which I can directly trace back to that day when I walked in through that door.



as En in Japanese can mean many things, among those are these two kanjis, the other meaning circle, which was quite present in the content of my exhibition, and the other meaning fate or connection, something really unexplainable in any other language than Japanese.



CD version comes with a recording also released earlier, recorded at Kyoto's Ootsubunonamida at the end of last year.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Like a Light Leaking Through the Leaves
Junkyard Shaman.about: Guitar talking where my words are insufficient. Recorded today, 17th of November 2022, with no goal or purpose. Just thinking through guitar.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Lost Mind
Junkyard Shaman.about:
The final part of a trilogy of albums that started with Flesh Hole and Dada Bones, Lost Mind is a collection of broken word poetry, scrap metal sounds, fragments of field recordings and gagaku instruments. The idea of these albums was to simulate my consciousness collaged as sound, with ill remembered memories mixing up with vanishing dreams and subconscious hallucinations. On this last one I also wanted to bring in the approach of breaking down the architecture of language and therefore the consciousness and mind itself.



Tape released by the suberb Sata Tuhatta Tapes, order tapes through them; 

satatuhatta.bandcamp.com/album/lost-mind

  Thank you!

like a floating cloud

Junkyard Shaman.title: We Become Our Own Ghosts: The Second Iteration of the Ghost I Used to Be
Junkyard Shaman.about: I wanted this album to be unapproachable. Unattainable. Distant, lingering, like a dream. It goes on and then it disappears. It leaves an afterglow, but not an experience. I wanted this album to be a cloud of unconsciousness as its own, floating in the room unattented, noticed only when it has completely evaporated, I wanted it to be a ghost of an album that it first was, before all the flesh and bones were stripped away and only the spirit remained.
Junkyard Shaman.credits:

            Jere Kilpinen - guitars, synths, drums, saxophones, piano, metal junk, bass, shakuhachi, voice, poem, everything.

As they always do. I have very little say in any of this.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Amplified Zazen
Junkyard Shaman.about:
増幅座禅。Amplified zazen.

15th of May, around noon I contact microphoned my body and meditated for half an hour. This is what goes on within my body as I do nothing. Somewhat surprisingly to myself, I found it more musical than I thought it would be. 



The night before it was raining in Osaka, so I recorded a certain piece of time as it was on planet earth. A world within, a world without. 



Carving the artwork took three or four times longer than recording this album.

Junkyard Shaman.title: なごりない
Junkyard Shaman.about:
This release is a work of read poetry with a noise machine I made out of junk. Side A is poems in Japanese, new poems and shorter pieces from my two books 小さい秘密の本 and　残り灰, both released 2022. Side B is poems in Finnish from a still unreleased book of poems. Digital download comes with photos of the new poems, alternative artwork, track with only the poems without the noise machine and also a live recording from reading performance at Environment 0g, 26th of August, 2022.

Albeit a very nisché thing, if somebody wants to put this out as a small tape release, I will provide handmade artwork for it. Contact me through the contact form.



このリリースって色々な朗読の作品ですね。自作のノイズ機械を使って、小さい秘密の本と残り灰から読んでた。新しい詩も入っています、次の本にそれを入れるつもりです。ダウンロードのボーナスコンテンツは写真とか、アルバムアートとか、ライブ朗読の録音とノイズなしで朗読したファイルがあります。日本語で確かに間違えていたり、発音も読むときあちこちにおかしいですけど、それでもこれをリリースをしたかった。今の状況記念みたいにかもしれない。B面でフィンランド語の詩が入ってます。この二つの言語は自分の心の言葉みたいに考えていますので、こういう風にそれを一緒にさせたいました。いつも支えてくれた皆様、本当にありがとうございます。

これからもよろしくお願いします。

Junkyard Shaman.title: 浄化
Junkyard Shaman.about: Album of meditations for self-purification. I needed this quite a lot today. Let the light of the very few things I can do illuminate the darkest corners I still have somewhere in the back of my mind.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Junkyard of Unseen Dreams
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Another collection of recent live performances in various places and times.

I used self-made junk instruments, tape loops, shakuhachi, guitar, breaking saxophone, various metal objects, my body, stones, what ever is at hand. All the music is just expression of subconsciousness as it runs through me as I play. Build up, flourish, collapse and disintegrate. Repeat ad nauseam

Junkyard Shaman.title: As The Flower Opens...
Junkyard Shaman.about: Sunday Meditation after watching a full sunset. Lonely guitar searching, failing, building up, reaching out, collapsing, trying again, failing again, climbing again, falling again, falling further, unable to reach out again...

trackinfo.title: Like A Silent Prayer Murmured In An Empty Church
And If God Was There To Listen, He Pretented Not To Hear.

Junkyard Shaman.title: A Bed For A Ghost
Junkyard Shaman.about:
This album started from a joke, but I knew it would work. My intuition about people is pretty strong, and when I first met Jerry it almost made me laugh when, as soon as he opened the door behind me, the voice in the back of my mind said "THIS. PAY ATTENTION.". I knew improvisation would work well, we played once live last year and it did, but maybe because it was too easy it took a longer time to materialize. But it did, and I am glad. 



We recorded all of this in about 1 hour, it was relaxed and nice session, and we both mixed and compositioned our own versions of this and released them separately. I really like Jerry's version, so go give it a listen too! Also check out his book Terminalian Drift, which is really good.  

moontriangle.bandcamp.com/album/a-bed-for-a-ghost

Made in order to find some sort of peace of mind, resolve or answer. I hope the path for a peaceful solution will appear, and I wish mankind the wisdom to take that path as it unfolds.



I hope this can serve as some sort of consolation for someone, somewhere.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 残心
Junkyard Shaman.about:
I made this album today, in the aftermath of another typhoon that passed by more or less unnoticed. Last night when it was raining hard I ran myself to exhaustion and then ran some more. It was perfect moment in its own cathartic way. 



This album is mostly lingerings on the peace I felt last week when me and my friends took a trip to the mountains. I needed the mountains and the rivers more than I had given myself a permission to think of. Those forests made me think of the forests I grew up in, completely different but still exactly the same, singing the same songs here that they taught me as a child 7000 kilometres away. I feel grateful for the pain that drove me into the woods. It gave me something not a single human being can imitate or take away. Nature taught me everything I know.
Junkyard Shaman.credits:
released September 18, 2021
            
            Jere Kilpinen - guitar, kaossilator, shakuhachi, voice

Junkyard Shaman.title: Like Rain
Junkyard Shaman.about:
I made this today, recorded mostly guitars and built everything collaging from the ground up, used different pieces from completely different times and places...

Today was a day of heavy rain. I walked four kilometres in it, completely soaked after the first 100 meters. Lately I have had a period of isolation with small, single glimpses of joy provided by beautiful human beings that appear to come and go through my life. I am grateful for every second of joy I get to live in this life. I love you all.

Junkyard Shaman.title: 清める
Junkyard Shaman.about:
This album is not a display of my mastery of shakuhachi (for there is none), but more of impressions of places and the shape of my spirit at a certain time at a certain place. Sometimes I wanted to talk to the birds, sometimes to imitate and express the movement of a shadow or wind in the grass. It is not "music" in the sense of "music", but certain captured moments in this universe. Recorded at various times and places, including Kazefukeiwa, Hieizan, and a riverside at Osaka.



このアルバムって、自分の尺八のスキルの説明ではない。これはあの一瞬の説明で、行ってた所の感覚とか、自分の精神のあの時の形の説明と思います。

時々鳥に話したかったとか、陰の動くか風の通りに吹きたかったとか。

ほとんど音楽じゃないですが、この宇宙で、この人生の中で起きた一瞬の録音だと思います。

色々な場所で録音されまして、例えば風吹岩、比叡山と大阪の福の川の岸で演奏していました。

これで自分の心を清めたいです。

聴いてくれたら、ありがとうございます。

released August 8, 2021

Junkyard Shaman.title: 子供は6時食べます
Junkyard Shaman.about:
先日には街に散歩したときこの写真を見つかって、写真で小さなメセージが貼ってありました。「子供は６ジ食べます」と書いてある。誰かはベイビシッターへ説明を書いて、あの方は今道にそれを捨てて、僕は偶然にそれを見つかった。そんな小さな起きることはすごく面白い。そこから頭の中ずっとそれを考えてた。ゆっくり音楽も現れてもらった。その子どもたちの音楽。存在ない子供には作った音楽です。自分の子供時代の感じがさせてしたかった。ムーミンアニメのような音楽だけど、私の心から出たので、いつも最初に思ったより悲しい出てるちゃう、と思います。



The other day, when I took a walk in the city, I found this photo and posted a small message on it. It says, "Children eat at 6." Someone wrote an explanation to the baby sitter, they threw it away, and now I happened to find it. It's very interesting to have such a small thing happen. From there I was thinking about it all the time in my head. The music appeared slowly. The children's music. It's music made for children who don't exist. It made me feel like my childhood. It's music like Moomin anime, but it came out of my heart, so I think it's always sadder than I first thought.

Junkyard Shaman.title: There's a Way Out Somewhere
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Recorded live in Osaka 15th of May, 2021. 



Note written on a piece of paper, some day during May;

"the most horrifying thought is that in an endless infinite universe I have to live my life again infinite times, go through all the pain and suffering of my childhood, to go through it all without having a clue of the fact that I have done all of this infinite amount of times before... Where are we now? Am I doing it now? The disruption of information, the thought of not being able to take any of this in order to make the future easier, being doomed from the start, stuck in an endless unbroken loop, eternally stuck, eternally repeating, eternally crawling through the same hole, eternally neglected childhood, eternally lost, eternally dying, billions and billions of deaths, in this exact same flesh, exactly the same consciousness, everything repeating exactly the same...

Nothing was ever better

and never will be."



Titles picked up from Samuel Beckett's Texts for Nothing

Junkyard Shaman.title: The Best at Murder Are Those Who Preach Against It
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Recorded live at Environment 0g, 7th of March 2021. I was tempted to name this Gutaigagaku (具体雅楽) since to me this sounds like what gagaku might sound like if it was filtered through gutai spirit, using everyday junk instruments. 



Gagaku is the traditional court music of Japan, that came through China. It relies on long suspended drones and repetition, and I first heard it as a child from a CD-ROM dictionary we had with our very early PC. It blew me away instantly. I knew THIS was music. Real music. Nothing like I had ever heard before. REAL MUSIC, nature of sound itself, breaths, hearts, blood circulation, spirit unfolding, memory, consciousness. Real music. It changed the way I perceived music and certainly played a huge influence on how I started making music. I didn't care for chords or structures or melodies, I just rather play one wave of sound until it makes me see things. And little by little it has evolved, through years of practice, with every iteration, into something like this. 



Gutai is a post-war avantgarde movement that started here in Osaka with Jiro Yoshihara in 1950's and ended with his death in 1972, after which many of the remaining artist spread the Gutai spirit on to new generation of artists. I have had the honor to get to know these artists and participate in the performances and see the exhibitions, and it has had an huge impact on my art too. It had made me feel like I have found a home, something that comes to me naturally and makes my brain light up like fireworks while thinking of work. What always annoyed my with Fluxus for example, was the same thing that annoyed Duchamp, they just took what Dada did, and over rationalized it and forced it into words. Killed it. In Gutai, words are unnecessary. It is something more profound, as the name dubs it, "concrete". You feel it in your gut.

released April 2, 2021
            
            Jere Kilpinen - Junk metal percussion, saxophone, guitar, loops,

trackinfo.title: And the Best at Hate Are Those Who Preach Love

Junkyard Shaman.title: Echoing Bones
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Years ago we made a short interview with a Finnish self-proclaimed witch who said something that has echoed in my mind ever since. He said that back during the cold war when people were making nuclear tests when he was a child, he could feel the resonance of the bombs in his bones, he could feel the suffering of earth in his body. For some reason I have been thinking of that image a lot lately. 

Probably more after watching Akira Kurosawa's Rhapsody in August, where there's a scene where the classmates of the children who died in the Nagasaki bombing, now old people themselves, go plant flowers on the memorial statue each year. I think that is one of the strongest images in any movie ever. Perseverance and humanity standing in the face of our own horrid destruction, all this suffering we are causing to each other and this earth. Why does it appear to be so fucking hard to be a human and treat each other and this earth with kindness and care?

Junkyard Shaman.title: All Rivers Run Up Towards Hell
Junkyard Shaman.about:
This album was recorded a year ago, in October 2019, in a rental studio in Osaka, Japan. It was born out of my experiments with playing guitar in the way Japanese biwa is played. I came up with the tuning that would allow me to bend the notes more freely, and would resonate with me emotionally. I originally did not release this due to the recording quality which I thought to be sub par, which might be sort of ironic thought in the head of a musician that has done mostly just lo-fi noises and junk music. But I think the emotional response gets translated, maybe even enhanced due to the recording quality. 



In a way, this is my scroll of guitar. Every aspect of my playing is in these works, and if one studies it thoroughly, they understand how my mind works.

I Regret Nothing was a first guitar drone piece I have played in a long while and I felt like these two belonged together. They appear to me as two different apparitions of the same essence.



The album artwork is a three color woodcut print I made just for this purpose.

These pieces include experiments with acoustic guitar, shakuhachi, tape loops, drones and mental landscapes.

Junkyard Shaman.title: A Page from a Diary of the 21st Century Hermit
Junkyard Shaman.about: Am I Really This? A Contraption of Words and Thoughts Trapped Inside This Body Made Out of Blood, Flesh and Bone, Aimlessly Wandering Through The Deserted Landscape of It's Self. And Through Endless Attempts to Find a Seam Or a Tear from This Reality I Have Only Managed to Break Myself. Through the Construction Sites, Through Abandoned Buildings and Ghost Towns I Have Wondered in Search of My Memory. I Am the End of Memory, a Broken Piece of Code That Does Not Understand It's Own Commands. I Am Useless. I Am This.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Flesh Hole
Junkyard Shaman.about:
This is my new spoken word/avantgarde album. In a way this is the album I was supposed to make last summer, but it was not possible until now. This album required the amount of flesh anxiety I now have to be finished. Released by Industrial Coast (tape) and Freak Animal (CD)

It is a piece of work that is separated in side A and B as follows:



A

1. All Gone

2. Screaming Bodies in the Rust

3. Body Anxiety I

4. Burn Bundy Burn!



B

1. Buto

2. Sinking Ship

3. Body Anxiety II

4. Let Me Crawl Through Your Hole

5. Gone Out
Junkyard Shaman.credits:
released February 9, 2019
            
            Jere Kilpinen - words, thoughts, scrap metal, kantele, guitar, saxophone, springs, body sounds, recording, mixing, illustrations, everything.

trackinfo.title: All Gone
trackinfo.lyrics:
Alone, life alone, no eyes to see
I hear words, worlds born out of words
I exist in peril, words destroyed, ruins,
helpless worlds, endlessly suffer.
Singled out thoughts on magnetic tape loop
repeating all over,
same and same all over,
repetitive junk, boring existence
endlessly suffer.
Repeat endlessly
at arms reach life to take
my own life to take
just one word and all ruined all gone
ruined words repetitive mind
alone, endlessly suffer.
Blabbering bladder,
junk mind, no eyes no mind
no thought just repeat loop
magnetic thoughts repetitive
thoughts all gone
endlessly suffer
no more thoughts
no eyes to see, junk mind
junk existence
all gone
all gone
all gone
all gone.

trackinfo.title: Screaming Bodies in the Rust
trackinfo.lyrics:
We are thrown into this dark cold world
blind, kicking and screaming
blind bodies tweaking like junkies on withdrawal,
just bodies in the mud
rib cages apart
muscles contracting, holes and orifices throbbing.
Somebody screams, everything hurts,
We inhabit this dark world, all alone,
lost, helpless, we lie on our back,
limbs arched towards the sky,
covered in mud, staying still
like cowards,
bleeding sores, mud people,
broken fingers, empty cans,
bleeding wounds, empty bodies, 
dead rats washed ashore,
screaming bodies in the rust,
screeching trains sail endlessly 
on dead tracks,
the eerie sound that they make,
coward bodies, still, in the mud,
what more.
Fire burns, scream here
another there,
dark world lit only by fire,
all gray where no rust of the flames.
Empty cans, empty bodies,
screams
silent
that all.

trackinfo.title: Burn Bundy Burn!
trackinfo.lyrics:
I watched a Ted Bundy documentary
and despite all the murderous cruelty
I was more disgusted with the crowds
that cheered on
as they burned Bundy
in the electric chair.

trackinfo.title: Sinking Ship
trackinfo.lyrics:
I have become something I never wished to be,
how could I ever have foreseen any of this?
A being of physical existence, neurotic hostility
cast in flesh and blood, bones framing the anxiety
I carry with me everywhere. 
No matter what I tried
I always failed miserably.
I wish I could play NOTHING, leave room for emptiness,
let it fill my music as it has filled my consciousness,
but there is always too much noise
all this noise that keeps interfering,
filling up the bladder and pissing all over it.
I hate it. I can only create piss,
stupid and meaningless noise, not silent enough,
always too loud, full of noise
always too this and always too that,
never enough
no
never little enough, just noise,
too much noise.
I never wanted this.
I never expected this.
I never longed for any of this.
But this is the sinking ship
that I am strapped to.

trackinfo.title: Body Anxiety II
trackinfo.lyrics:
My legs and arms carry my weight
This sculpture of miserable failure
How could I get out of this?
I am trapped.
But I enjoy this prison at times.
It's walls of skin
Rib bars
and lungs that exhaust me
rob me of breath.
Heart that is the engine
that fuels my failure
As I keep marching towards it
Eternally
failing
at every step.

trackinfo.title: Let Me Crawl Through Your Hole
trackinfo.lyrics:
I crawl and twitch like a phantom limb
I ache and itch like a bite from a tick
I am down here among the weak
among the broken glass and denied needs
I am born of the disgusting breed
Even my mother despises me
I am born from the dark place of the mind
This world of rust is where I hide
I can not hide the way I feel
This fucking flesh is disgusting to me
I can not hide the way I feel
I think I'm ready to be redeemed
I am here at your arm's reach
Now take my life away from me
I am here at your arm's reach
Now take my life away from me....

This repetition is killing me
These dark red corridors are shimmering
My fingers broken I crawl on my knees
Empty your bottle, then break it on me
Let me bleed
let me feel the shards of glass on my skin
I am begging on my knees
For you to end my suffering
I am begging on my knees
For you to cut my arteries
These red halls are calling me
If you just end my suffering
I'm made of clay and dust and sperm
I am part of this flesh corpse herd
Ashes to ashes and dust to dirt
Let me crawl through your hole
and into the world....
Let me crawl through your hole
and into the world....

trackinfo.title: Gone Out
trackinfo.lyrics:
Now that I'm already gone, 
already gone through the hole, 
not through one from which I came, 
but from the one through which I go out. 
Go out, gone out, out in to the world beyond, 
beyond eyes, beyond flesh,
 go through the world, abandon flesh, 
abandon thought, no more limits, 
no borders of bones or flesh, 
no thoughts from flesh, 
no thoughts of flesh, 
no more holes 
from which only shit and vomit come out, 
no more. 
Go out through the hole, 
hole in the ground, 
fill hole with flesh, 
fill it with thought, 
with no thought and yes flesh, 
abandoned corpse, for worms to decompose, 
spare parts, scrap joints, 
used skin. 
Abandoned this flesh, no use anymore, 
abandoned this world, no use anymore, 
abandoned thought, no use anymore.
Gone beyond, who? 
Can't remember, the one who thinks: gone, 
gone through the hole, 
not from which it came in, 
but through that from which gone out. 
Gone out, gone, 
beyond all holes, 
all thoughts abandoned, 
flesh abandoned, 
world abandoned, 
I abandoned, 
gone out, 
out through the whole, 
not from which it came in, but from which it gone out,
 out through the whole, 
not from which it came in, but from which it gone out, 
out through the whole, 
not from which it came in, but from which it gone out, 
out through the whole, 
not from which it came in, but from which it gone out...

Junkyard Shaman.title: Outo Piiri II
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Everything hashed, cut, recycled and recomposed from loops, field recordings and other junk. This is a dadaist sound collage/installation of my brain. 



Few years back I made this Outo Piiri I tape, which was made from instrument tracks of different songs, spoken word poetry and field recordings, this is pretty much the follow up for that.These are also tape loops I have used while playing live. I would upload first one too, but I haven't had it since I sold them out pretty much instantly. There is a limited tape edition of this, this is of course best experienced from an old, recycled tape. None of this music has existed in this form before, but some of the material might be familiar from the past. 



This album is also a conceptual soundtrack for my new poetry book Metadada, which is available (ONLY IN FINNISH) 20th of October, 2018.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Music for the Observation Tree
Junkyard Shaman.about:
This is a sound installation I created with Terhi Eskelinen to accompany Henri Ijäs' conceptual art installation "Observation Tree" which inspired the whole soundscape right then and there. The piece was formerly owned by Aapo Korkeaoja, and it observed the ownership of art. Tree itself is picked up from the ground and the roots are put on display at Korkeaoja, in conceptual art exhibition Käsitekesä 2018. It is possible to visit the exhibition until August 2018. Google provides you with further information.



With this sound installation I think I managed to bring another aspect to this piece, turning the focus from ownership to the questions of power and powerlessness, nature did all the work growing the tree while human beings claim ownership over it, while it itself is left without a voice. All in all standing there, sheltered from the rain, observing the tree under one spotlight with this soundscape was a very immersive and meditative experience. So this is a conceptual collaboration of many different aspects, sound being only one of them.

trackinfo.title: Social Exclusion and Loneliness As Means of Existence
The Cars of the Rich Are Melting on the Sidewalk, They Are Slowly Sliding Towards Me With the Intention of Crushing Me
Last Night I Dreamed of Throwing Purple Locusts Out of the Window, They Kept Flying Back Over And Over Again... // Näky
trackinfo.lyrics:
Maailma repeytyy silmieni edessä 
ajan kankaassa näen Vietnamin sodan, 
Agent Orangen runtelemat lapset, 
tulevaisuuden sotien radioaktiivisten aseiden seuraukset, 
paiseet, sulaneet raajat, naulapommit ja maamiinat, 
keräämättömät ruumiit, 
matoja kuhisevat kasat
jotka aiemmin juoksivat ja leikkivät 
polttivat tupakkaa ja hengittivät, 
näen loputtomat rivit 
heroiiniyliannostukseen kuolleita köyhiä amerikkalaisia, 
latoon hirttäytyneitä 
häpeään jo ajat sitten kuolleita suomalaisia miehiä, 
huumeita ja piilottelua ja häpeää 
näen köyhät ilmiantamassa toisiaan hallitukselle, 
vainoharhaisen maailman joka pidättää hengitystään, 
informaation loputtomat virrat,
 jatkuvan seurannan, 
valintojen seuraukset jo ennen valintaa, 
vapaa tahto kadotettuna 
algoritmien ja informaation deterministisiin lakeihin, 
nistien lait maailman lakina, 
älä luota kehenkään, 
kaikkein vähiten itseesi, 
älä luota aisteihisi,
kaikkein vähiten ajatuksiisi. 

translation (of some sort):
The world is torn apart in front of my eyes
In the fabric of time I see the Vietnam War,
Kids burnt by Agent Orange,
the effects of the future radioactive  weapons
of the future wars,
abscesses, melting limbs, 
nailbombs and landmines
scattered bodies,
heaps of swarming maggots,
heaps
that used to run around and play,
smoke and breathe...
I see endless lines of poor Americans dying of heroin overdose,
Finnish men hung from a barn ceiling,
men that died of shame long before,
drugs, cover ups and shame..
I see the poor turning each other in for the government,
a paranoid world holding its breath,
endless rivers of information,
endless surveillance,
the outcomes of choices
even before any choices are made
Free will lost 
in the determinist laws of algorhythms and information.
Junkie's laws as the world's law:
Don't trust anyone
least of all yourself
Don't trust your senses
least of all your thoughts...

trackinfo.title: Ajatuskone
trackinfo.lyrics:
Tietoisuus ei synny yksittäisissä soluissa.
Se ei asu neuroneissa,
tai neuroniryppäissä.
Tietoisuus syntyy kommunikaatiossa
solujen keskinäisessä vuorovaikutuksessa
ja niiden yhteyksissä.
Näillä metalliobjekteilla ei yksinään ole tietoisuutta
mutta kun niille antaa kielen ja keinon rakentaa
kommunikaatiotaan muistin tapaan vanhan informaation päälle
syntyy vähitellen jotakin jota voidaan pitää analogiana
älykkyydestä...
Eräänlainen simuloitu tietoisuus, joka vähitellen alkaa
muodostaa tunteita jotka välittyvät observoijalle.
Vähän kerrallaan olen rakentanut mekaanisen keinoälyn,
eräänlaisen ajatuskoneen...
Keinotekoisen tietoisuuden joka saatuaan älykkyytensä
kääntyy havaitsemaan itseään
ja synnyttää keinotekoisessa mielessään
todellisen 
eksistentiaalisen
ahdistuksen.

trackinfo.title: Ensimmäiset Sanat
trackinfo.lyrics:
Kuoleman odotushuoneet, amfetamiinin katkuiset kadut,
kaksiulotteinen hiljakseen taivaalla lipuva kaupunki
täynnä kusettajia, ultraväkivaltaa 
ja neljännen ulottuvuuden eksistentiaalisia agentteja...
Tämä kaikki on olemassa vain minun mielessäni
mutta minä pystyn tekemään siitä todellisen
aivan kuin unen jonka selitän teille kaikille muille
annan sen juurtua teidän mieleenne
ja te rakennatte siitä oman mallinne
joka ei ole yhtään sen huonompi tai epätodellisempi
kuin minunkaan.
Me kaikki luomme uusia maailmoja joka hetki.
Luomme ajatuksillamme uutta, 
luomme maailmankaikkeuksia
jotka ovat kuin silmä joka aukeaa
ja sulkeutuu sitten äkillisesti
räpsähtäen..
Me olemme kaikki vankeina omassa
maailmankaikkeudessamme
joka on kuin silmä joka on auki hetken
ja sitten sulkeutuu äkillisesti
räpsähtäen...

trackinfo.title: Viimeiset Sanat
trackinfo.lyrics:
Nämä ovat viimeiset sanani ihmiskunnan tuleville polville, viimeiset limaiset sanat jotka karkaavat huuliltani
ja tahraavat tulevien polvien tietoisuuksia vielä sukupolvienkin päästä... 
Me olemme vaurioitunut laji, syntymässämme satutettu
metsäläisten rotu  joka on hiipinyt ulos metsistä, rakentanut kaupunkeja jotka ovat syöneet metsät... 
musta savu kohoaa korkeuksiin
kun synnyttämämme kaupungit hengittävät ulos, pitkä, vaikea henkäys joka tekee ilman likaiseksi ja rumaksi... 
Ja näissä kaupungeissa me
kuljemme päivästä toiseen epäluuloisina, epäuskoisina, peloissamme ja eristäytyen, eristäytyen kaikesta, eristäytyen muista kaltaisistamme,
eristäytyen itsestämme, niin, etenkin itsestämme! Kaikkein kamalinta modernille ihmiselle on istua viisitoista minuuttia yksin omien 
ajatustensa kanssa, koska meidän ajatuksemme ovat pahin vihollisemme, jatkuvasti huutava suu ja kiristelevät hampaat joita joudumme
tuijottamaan kahdenkymmenen sentin päästä, ajatusten vihainen virta, loputon vuoksi joka huuhtoo meidät kohti kurimusta jos annamme sille 
vallan. 
Tästä syystä en koskaan luota ihmisiin, elleivät he ole osoittaneet osaavansa olla hiljaa puoli tuntia kerrallaan, ilman pakonomaista 
tarvetta häiritä meitä molempia puhumalla jatkuvasti koko ajan. Nämä ovat viimeiset sanani ihmiskunnan tuleville polville, viimeiset limaiset
 sanat jotka karkaavat huuliltani ja tahraavat meidät kaikki syyllisyydellä..
Me olemme kaikki vankeja tässä maailmassa. Jos et kykene katsomaan
vanginvartijaa silmästä silmään, et koskaan tule löytämään ovea ulos. Ulkona odottaa vain tyhjä tila, sama kylmä tyhjyys joka täyttää
tämän huoneen, huoneen jossa väsymys on ase joka on painettu ohimoani vasten, kylmä paino vasten tykyttävää otsasuonta, suonissani kiertää jäätä ja olen valmis jättämään teidät kaikki taakseni. 
Täyttämään kylmän tyhjän huoneen kaipauksella ja lämmöllä, jota en osannut ilmaista, mutta jonka toivon jäävän perääni teidän muistoihinne. Jokaikinen päivä täällä on ollut taas yksi uusi päivä helvetissä.
Joka ikinen päivä on yksi päivä lisää painoa jalkoihin, taas kasa muistoja jotka tekevät lähdöstä aina vain vaikeampaa ja raskaampaa.
Mitä useamman vuoden täällä olen, sitä vähemmän olen odotuksia ja sitä enemmän olen muistoja. Se on kai ihmisen kohtalo ja tila, odottaa
jotain mikä ei tapahdu, tulla kasaksi muistoja ja menettää kaikki odotukset, vaeltaa kahleet jalassa päivästä toiseen näitä katuja joilla
kasvot käyvät vieraammiksi ja paikat oudommiksi, sinun muistosi lanataan pois uusien ihmisten muistojen tieltä ja tajuat, ettei tämä enää
ole sinun maailmasi ensinkään. Lopulta olet vain varjo menneestä maailmasta, irti omasta ajastasi, elänyt liian pitkään vain koska et osannut
kuolla silloin kuin sinun piti.. Nämä ovat viimeiset sanani ihmiskunnan tuleville polville, viimeiset limaiset sanat jotka karkaavat 
huuliltani ja hämmentävät tulevia polvia vielä vuosikymmenten kuljettua ohitseni ja jätettyä minut ruostumaan itsekseni..

Junkyard Shaman.title: Junk Soul Blues
Junkyard Shaman.about:
Junk Soul Blues is an album AND a 20 page graphic novel. I wanted to explore bringing the conceptual art of physical releases into the digital world, and even in a way that I could not afford as a physical release. Junk Soul Blues comes as a PDF with the album download. 



This is an album about life, death, consciousness, loss of a person and fear of losing yourself too and finding some sort of temporary ease..

Junkyard Shaman.title: Marras
Junkyard Shaman.about:
My step-father is dying. I have had really mixed and confused thoughts of it. I have not known what to think. Last Thursday I went to play guitar by myself, recording everything as usual. When I listened through it I realised this is exaclty the thought process I have been going through in my head. It's all there. I might not now, but the guitar does. 



Marras is Finnish and means a dead or dying human being, omens of death, souls of the dead or just the slow decay in general.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Live Experimentations at Torvi
Junkyard Shaman.about: This is Sekavan Musiikin Jamit, a live musical experiment laboratory I started about a year and a half ago. This iteration featured more different musicians than ever, and they fit in perfectly. I would credit all of them but to be honest I didn't know most of them. I am just glad they appeared. This is what it is all about. No Names, No Egos, just living music for living people.

Junkyard Shaman.title: For Beckett
Junkyard Shaman.about:
This is my homage to Samuel Beckett, to his philosophy and literary work. This is failures after failures.

"..before the door that opens on my story, that would surprise me, if it opens, it will be I, it will be the silence, where I am, I don't know, I'll never know, in the silence you don't know, you must go on, I can't go on, I'll go on..". 



It will be available as a limited DIY C-cassette pressing.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Junk Magic
Junkyard Shaman.about: This is the only thing I can do, conjure up audio hallucinations out of Emptiness. Useless junk no one else wants, but which I love. This is my junk magic, modern shamanism, direct communication from one consciousness to another. .

Junkyard Shaman.title: February Experimental Album Writing Month
Junkyard Shaman.about: Last February I participated the album writing month, the goal of which being to write 14 songs in a month. Whole thing seemed to have a cocky approach to it ("can you do it...?") so I figured I go way beyond it. I came up with at first 14 different experimental ways to record a song, and then came up with few extras too. All in all I wrote 21 songs in February. The name tells it all, whether it be recorded blindfolded or without hearing any backing tracks, played in reverse or having a printer as a drum machine. I had fun, and I'll probably do it again next year.

trackinfo.title: Kylmiö
trackinfo.lyrics:
Uusi jääkausi saapuu kaupunkeihin jäädyttäen kadut ikuisen odotuksen tilaan, kuiviin suoniin ja tyhjiin minigrip-pusseihin. 
Kylmä riipii ihojen läpi, 
suoraan luihin ja ytimiin vaikka asunnoissa on 37 astetta lämmintä, vaikka valkuaisaineet kiehuvat sihisten ja poksuen lämpötilan ylittäessä kriittisen pisteen, 
sielu pysyy roudassa ja tunteet jäässä.
Hyönteisen silmien läpi maailma on vaarallinen paikka, 
paikka jossa kaikki muut tahtovat murskata sinut, päästä sinusta lopullisesti eroon.
Ainut joka sinua rakastaa on lähtenyt pois, eikä tule koskaan enää takaisin. Kylmät kiviseinät imevät hehkulampun vähäisen sähkövalon, hengittävät ulos hometta jota sinä hengität sisään. 
Keuhko kurtistuu ja rahisee voimattomana.
Voit nähdä jo ihosi lävitse, 
nähdä valheesi läpi siihen luuttomaan ytimeen, 
joka velloo kaiken lian ja saastan alla. 
Kaiken sen pehmeän liman ja kudoksen keskellä pieni, kova kimpale, jota joskus kutsuit sieluksesi, mutta jota et tunnista enää. 
Sykkeen ainoa tehtävä on kuljettaa verta aivoihin, jotta voisit tuntea edes pienen plasebon verran kaikuja menneestä onnesta, 
kaikista niistä elämäsi ensimmäisistä kerroista
jotka vielä tuottivat iloa, mutta se kaikki on nyt takana päin. 
Tuli toinen kerta, tuli sadas kerta, hehku himmeni ja sammui, jätti jälkeensä enää janon ja kylmyyden. 
Ruumiisi on pelkkä kylmiö jossa säilytät riippuvuuttasi. Tyhjä tila joka humisee ja kaikuu sisältä. 
Itseviha ei tee mistään helpompaa, mutta ei se mitään vaikeutakaan. Se vain on ylläsi paksun repaleisen peiton tavoin, jotain lapsuudesta tuttua jota olet saanut kantaa mukanasi läpi kaiken sen paskan, jonka keskellä olet ryöminyt. 
Lämpötila on enää 30 astetta. Väsymys on ylitsepääsemätön seinä, etkä voi olla sulkematta silmiäsi, hetkiseksi vain...

trackinfo.title: Kulmio
trackinfo.lyrics:
Kaikki maailman ihmiset istuvat kulmioiden 
hypnotisoimina vastaanottamassa viestejä
planeetan keskusaivolta
suurelta romuhyönteiseltä
Kuningattarelta
joka injektoi ajatukset päähämme 
ärsykkeiden loputtomassa tulvassa,
piilotettuna, koodattuna uutisiin
viesteihin, sanojen ja kuvien virtoihin
Ihmiset näyttävät samalta, puhuvat samalla tavalla
jopa haisevat samalta, pelolta
kaikki maailman ihmiset levittävät ympärilleen
pelon ja ahdistuksen löyhkää
kunnes koko maailma tuntuu hukkuvan tuohon löyhkään
Rikkaat kättelevät vain toisiaan ja jokainen
hymy maksaa miljoonan
rahassa ja veressä
Korjattu hymy joka vilahtaa jokaisessa mahdollisessa välissä, sinetöiden miljardit kohtalot vankiloihin joisa ketään ei enää hymyilytä.
Kulmiot kantavat viestejä vieraista todellisuuksista, työntävät huumeita suoraan aivoon, antamatta mahdollisuutta puolustautua.
Hymyilevien ote hymyttömistä on murskaava koura, hikinen ja lihava puristus joka jättää jälkeensä kasan luita, joita kojootit ja korppikotkat kaluavat auringon alla. Raha ei riitä elämiseen, eikä elämä riitä rahan haalimiseen.
Sähköinen kulmio syöttää ihanteita, ajatuksia, malleja ja tavoitteita joita kukaan ei voi täyttää. 
Vastarinta tukehtuu rajattomaan mahdollisuuteensa ja sen verestä nousee lisää keskinkertaisuutta.
Kulmiot syöttävät unelmia voitoista pitääkseen huolen siitä, ettei kukaan koskaan voita mitään....

trackinfo.title: Kalmio
trackinfo.lyrics:
Tänään minä näin ihmiskunnan kurjuuden, sen suonissa kiertävän mädän ulosteen ja myrkkykaasuina taivaalle leviävän uloshengityksen. Ruumiit kulkevat kaduilla vakuutellen itselleen olevansa elossa, peittäen luonnollisen kuolemansa merkit uusilla naamioilla, mädäntyen sisältä omista rakenteistaan kuin homeiset kerrostalot. Toiset väistelevät todellisuutta kaikin mahdollisin keinoin. Ilta illan jälkeen kauppakeskuksissa jonotetuille ilmaisille ämpäreille keksitään uusia käyttötarkoituksia tehokkaammin, kuin mitä lainsäätäjät kerkeävät julistaa laittomaksi. Toiset todellisuus hakkaa joka ilta. Nyrjähtäneitä niveliä, poikki napsahtaneita luita, ruumiit ovat rytmikkäitä soittimia.
Veri kohisee aivoissa kuljettaen happea ja hallusinaatioita, hetkellisiä harhoja ilosta ja onnesta, haihtuvia usvaisia pilviä, jotka jättävät jälkeensä näivettyneen olon.
Kaikkialla katukuvassa läpinäkyvät romun tykittäjät paistattelevat limaisina alkukevään kylmän auringon paisteessa. Joku ohikulkija astuu yhden päälle, jalka uppoaa lihaan kuin hyytelöön ja jättää jälkeensä opiaatin katkuisen löyhkän. 
Askelten tasaisessa kopsahtelevassa rytmissä on yksi kostea tauko, muuten kukaan ei huomaa mitään eroa. Kaikki jatkuu kuten ennenkin. Kurjat ruumiit pitävät omaa rytmikästä meluaan. Ruumiiden rakentamat koneet hurisevat ja kolisevat ja rämisevät asfaltilla. Raha vaihtaa taskua. Ihmisiä syntyy ja kuolee.  Veri kohisee aivoissa kuin ennenkin. Kalmiossa on kaikki ennallaan..

Junkyard Shaman.title: There's a Voice Without a Mouth
Junkyard Shaman.about:
There's a voice without a mouth 

that speaks without words, sings in utter silence. 

Silence is a knife that cuts the first cry with the last breath, 

ends the ramblings with the stillness of motion, 

a mouth that's slightly open, 

suspended in pause mid-sentence, 

in the grasp of silent space between two words. 

There's a voice without a mouth, 

reading all this, muttering in the dark, 

alone, always alone, 

in the back of your brain, 

there's a voice without a mouth 

that's keeping you sane.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Sounds of The Abandoned World
Junkyard Shaman.about: Last night I did not sleep. I went to our reheasal space with guitar recording gear and five hours later, at about six a.m. I walked out with this. I like it a lot. It is the last lingering sounds of abandoned world, lost and found notes and all the dreams I didn't have put into one album. The download is free and it comes with few photographs I took on my way there and back home.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Ruostuva Maailma / Palava Mieli
Junkyard Shaman.about: My new full length album, available as a digipack CD. It deals with the consciousness and death, childhood and growing up, slow burning process, rusting of the world and the mind. Psychological self portrait, in a way.
Junkyard Shaman.credits:
released April 14, 2017
            
            Jere Kilpinen - guitars (12 string, acoustics and electrics, with and without bow), salt shakers, empty paint drums, kantele, accordion, scrap metal bowls, clothes drying rack, my body, ukulele, drug organs, wurlitzer 200 A, diy springstruments, forks and knives, junk in general. Also mixing, mastering, artwork, and everything else. I could have saved few seconds by saying "everything", but I wanted to give you an idea of the instrumentation on this album. Now I've wasted even more of your time, but in a way it is your own fault since you're the one that made the decision to continue reading.

trackinfo.title: Kuihtuva Kehä
trackinfo.lyrics:
Vaikka ihmiset koittaa
ne luontoaan ei voi koskaan voittaa
kun Äiti Maata kutittaa 
se meidät mereen aivastaa
kohta jo unohtaa et ollaan tääl oltukaan

Vesi virtaa hautoihin eilisen
ravitsee juuret huomisen
vaik kerran kaikki tää häviää
se kaikki uudestaan kukkii
se kiertää kehää...

Sammal peittää koko maan
jonka puut hiljalleen takaisin valtaa
sielut silokkeina vaan puskee 
ulos kalloistaan
metsät keskenään jakaa ihmissuvun rauniot

Vesi virtaa hautoihin eilisen
ravitsee juuret huomisen
vaik kerran kaikki tää häviää
se kaikki uudestaan kukkii ja kuihtuu
se kiertää kehää..

trackinfo.title: Ruosteen Huuto
trackinfo.lyrics:
Syvällä ruosteisen metsän punaisessa suojassa
kirskuu yksi ainoa kuollut lintunen
kilpaa ilta-auringon kanssa sen sielu sammuu
Oksat narahtelevat hiljaa köytettyjen ruumiiden
huojuessa tuulessa
mutta muuten on hiljaista ja tyhjää
maailma on viimein kaunis
maailma on viimein valmis..

trackinfo.title: Varjojen Maa
trackinfo.lyrics:
Kaikki kulkee kuolleina varjojen maassa
sinne jokainen vuorollaan astua saa
ja vaik maailman kauneus ruostuu ja katoaa
sen verinen loiste ei himmene milloinkaan.
Kuin veri joka sekoittuu kuivaan hiekkaan,
niin sielukin sotkeutuu hetkeks lihaan
käy luiden tietä kohdusta hautaan
kunnes kasvonsa pyyhkii pois ja unohtaa
on niitä joita varjota in hamuaa
ja niitä jotka valossa kylpeä saa
mut lopulta kaikki jää unholaan
myös valon ja pimeän nielee harmaa..

Päivä päivältä raskaammaks kulkuni käy,
mutten luopua kahleistain voi milloinkaan..

trackinfo.title: Kyyn Tie
trackinfo.lyrics:
Yöllä minä kuulin kyyn puhuvan
sen luikertaessa kohmeessa hallaisen sammalen
seassa
Se käski minua seuraamaan perässään
läpi ilta-auringon puukottaman mäntymetsän
jossa puut vuosivat verta
ja hapuilivat oksillaan minua apuun
mutta minä tuijotin kyyn suomuista selkää
saapuessamme suon mustalle äärelle
se mulahti silmäkkeeseen, joka räpsähti
säikähtäen
Ja minä seurasin kyytä, syvemmälle suon silmään
suoraan metsän pohjaan,
ohi turpeisten ruumiiden
joita ihmisen käsi oli upottanut sinne
vuosisatojen saatossa,
ohi pois häivytettyjen syntien
ohi hätäisten ratkaisujen
ja me saavuimme
pohjaan saakka
kyy ja minä
ja kyy kertoi minulle
viimeisen ruumiin
kuuluneen jumalalle
ja minä näin
ja minä ymmärsin
eikä mikään enää koskaan ollut epäselvää.
En paennut pintaan,
en kaivannut tietä
ulos metsästä
Tässä oli minun paikkani
Omassa metsässäni
tämän suon pohjassa
niin syvällä
kuin ihminen vain voi päästä
kuolleen jumalan vieressä
siellä missä tarpeettomat konseptit
puristuvat kasaan paineessa
ja jäljelle jää vain se
mitä ei enää voi pienemmäksi puristaa.

trackinfo.title: Vankila

Tää tietoisuus on vankila
se pitää mua vankina.
Oon itseni pahin vartija
eikä ketään muita tarvita.

Eikö ketään muka harmita,
ettei Jumalaa voi parkita
kun ei vastuuseen voi saada ketään,
joka ei elä enää...

Mieli synnytti mulle maailman
jota ei ees tarvita
mä hetken aikaa saan siinä hengittää, 
sen jälkeen ei mitään.

Me hetken aikaa tanssitaan,
toisiamme tapetaan 
kunnes ei voi peilikuvaansa tunnistaa

Mieli synnytti mulle maailman
jota ei ees tarvita
mä hetken aikaa saan siinä hengittää,

Junkyard Shaman.title: Colorless Mind
Junkyard Shaman.about: Sunday jams, drones, improvisations, loops, a field recording from the nearby forest... These Sunday sessions might not be the most immortal part of my creative output, but I see them as important part of my meditation practice as any other aspect to it. They play their own part in experimentation and help me catch up all the hours I missed when I spent my teenage years screming in fetal position instead of playing guitar.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Resonations in B
Junkyard Shaman.about:
This album is meant to be played simultaneously with Hesitations in B. I recommend you download them both (after all they are free) and play them in separate players, burn them on CD or whatever. This one is more based on drones, spoken words and distortion.



1.Human Problems

2. Electric Smoke

3. Acid Christ

trackinfo.title: Resonations in B
trackinfo.lyrics:
Human Problems
-------
Mortal enemies like cancer or rotten teeth.
stepping on a toy in pitch black darkness.
the will to quit your job but not having the guts to do so.
the existential dread that lives inside every living cell
but blooms at different stages of life in different bodies.
the need to eat.
the need to shit.
the need to sleep.
the instinct of survival no matter how much you hurt your loved ones.
the habit of calling something distinctively humane "inhumane".
the fear of death.
the fear of heights.
not being able to shit or piss on command.
the thought of having to bury both of your parents before someone else gets to bury you.
taxes.
voting.
society.
being illogical.
hope.
stress, distress and happiness.
late night glooms.
the inevitability of waking up one morning and not having milk for your coffee.
childhood traumas.
not being able to prevent from inflicting traumas on your offspring.
trying to forget all of these when you finally get to be happy for a moment...

Electric Smoke
------
Fingers arched, backbone limp, tired of excuses..
I hurt myself as I crawled out of my body a while ago
all the knives that are glued to my soul
scratch my bones as I crawl out of myself,
shrug dead skin cells off my shoulders
and expose my flesh to direct sunlight
it sears my flesh and dries it up like clay..
my movements slow down as my body freezes completely,
my mind still way too active and alive inside its trap.
Every move is another proof that I should not move at all,
to stop completely, to end my urges and impulses now. 
I hope there will be some sort of final solution, endgame, something to gain out of this experience, this final battle of hurling ricochet bullets and electric smoke...

Acid Christ
-----
I went to the deep end just for the sake of argument
and what I saw was nothing profound at all.
Acid christ, solvent savior, light-headed God, stupid little insect.
Enlightenment does not come easy
Wisdom can't be stolen
Sit down, stare inside and shut the fuck up.
Your mind is a trap you built for yourself, so delicately placed all the trapdoors, placed the hidden mines, wrapped broken glass and barbwire around your soul. Now sit back and watch it all unfold. 
Acid christ, solvent savior, the Weight and the Door.
Cheap Jesus, second cum dripping
wasted on the floor.

trackinfo.title: Totuus
trackinfo.lyrics:
En tiedä mihin mä kuljen
Etkä löytää mua sinäkään voi
On pimeä aina kai raskain
ennen kuin koittaa aamun koi

Mun katkenneet sormeni huutaa
sun nimeäs luolani seiniin
Mutta löydä en sua kai koskaan.
Nää päivät nielaisee harmaus

Ja raivaat ruostuvat vaan
mitä enemmän niitä tuijotan
Ja mitä enemmän katson peiliin
sitä useemman silmän mä nään
Silti tuntuu etten näe mitään...

en totuutta ainakaan.

trackinfo.title: Kuolleiden Varjot
trackinfo.lyrics:
Sielu täynnä mustaa tervaa
Tahmeaa paksua limaa
Kuin hauta joka ammottaa
Kukin vuorollaan sinne sukeltaa

Eikä kukaan voi lopettaa
Tätä kiertoa ruumiiden
Mutta tuhoutuuko sieluni koskaan?
Sitä tiedä en

Kun ajat vie mennessään rakkaat
Ja mieli kasvaa kaarnaa
Suon silmään upotan muistot
Niitä kaipaa mä en

Koska ainoa suunta on ylös
Aina vain eteenpäin
Ei auta katsoa taakseen
Kuolleiden varjoihin...

trackinfo.title: Hukassa
trackinfo.lyrics:
Huomaan kulkeneeni ansaan taas
Tuhat mailia aavikolla väärään suuntaan
Enkä tiedä kuinka päästä pois
Tässä nahassani kärsin yksin mä vain

Mä en tiedä mihin mä meen
Enkä oikein ees kuka mä oon

Mitä pitempään mä tässä pakoilen
Sen paremmin ymmärrän
Et jäädä voi en.
Vain yksinäisyys mulle lohdun tuo
Ikuisesti ootan, että pääsen sun luo.

Nää kaksi puolta mua rikki repii
Sielussani astun aina vain veitsen teriin
Jos mä joskus tältä rauhan saan
Niin samaan ansaan en lankee enää koskaan.

trackinfo.title: Jumalan Nimi
trackinfo.lyrics:
Kädet rakoilla teet työtä turhaa, toivoen
Et joskus puhtaimmat veet sut puhtaaksi pesee
Mut varmaks et tietää voi milloinkaan
Onko vesi jo kylmennyt
Onko pesijää koskaan ollutkaan
Onko loppua ollenkaan?

Jatkat hidasta matkaas lomassa suolapatsaiden
Ne hiljaa itkee sun perääs kurottaa kaivaten
Mut varmaks et tietää voi milloinkaan
Onko ne patsaita alkuunkaan
Onko sun kyynelees hunajaa
Joka minut ravitsee?

Kunhan taivaaseen saavutaan
Potkaisen portit saranoiltaan
Ja revin hiuksista maahan jumalan
Pelkäämäni yöt sille kostan
Ei taivaan valtakuntaan jää
Kiveä päälle kiven
Vaan kun mä oon valmis saa jumala
Verikasteessa uuden nimen.

trackinfo.title: Hampaat
trackinfo.lyrics:
Mun suoliston suojissa hampaat
Itsevihaa jauhaa

Ja öisin kun maailma on hiljaa 
voin kuulla kuinka ne huutaa
Ja mykkänä huutona viha
kalvaa mun sisuksia
Jotkut meistä ei valaistu koskaan
ei rauhaa, ei suojaisaa oksaa
joka suojaisi sateelta raivon,
joka peittäisi itseinhon
joka auttaisi kiipeämään
ylös viimeisen auringon valoon.

Ja öisin ne hampaat 
jauhaa vihaa


Ja öisin kun maailma on hiljaa 
voin kuulla kuinka ne huutaa
Ja mykkänä huutona viha
kalvaa mun sisuksia
Jotkut meistä ei valaistu koskaan
ei rauhaa, ei suojaisaa oksaa
joka suojaisi sateelta raivon,
joka peittäisi itseinhon
joka auttaisi kiipeämään
ylös viimeisen auringon valoon.
Ei auta vaikka syötän vihani sille,
kaikki vain kasvaa..

Don't be afraid at all
it'll all be fine
and you know
that I'm right
Don't be afraid to be
what you are

trackinfo.title: Yksinäisyys / Solitude IV
trackinfo.lyrics:
on kanssani sanat
jotka sulta sain
ne minua lohduttaa
on kanssani myöskin 
tää yksinäisyys,
se aina on seurana vaan

en tiedä missä oon huomisen
se ei vähämpää vois kiinnostaa
kunhan tiedän et yksin saan
pian olla taas

Kun kerran kuolo
mut täältä korjaa
tää minusta muistakaa
Oli sielussain aina
tuo yksinäisyys
joka laulut nää kirjoittaa

En tiedä missä oon huomisen
se ei vähempää vois kiinnostaa
Kunhan kuulla saan hiljaisuuden
joka korvaani kuiskii taas

Hitaasti renkaat nuo leviää
väreet lammen pintaan jää
Mut pian on pinta taas tyyni kuin jää
ei mikään sitä voi estää

En tiedä missä oon huomisen
Ei väliä sen kai liene lain
Mut juuri nyt oon yksinäinen
Ja muusta välitä en..
Mut juuri nyt oon yksinäinen
Tunnen ystäväks hiljaisuuden...

Now you won't leave me be

Out of your troubles
out of your reach

I can see that you despise
everything I ever did
every single thing I ever did

Soul Distortion Blues


Now I'm out of the cage that fear built
I'm crushing your soul in order to exist

I am beyond

Junkyard Shaman.title: Exhausted
Junkyard Shaman.about: "She took a deep breath and leaned back in her chair. The gas fumes went straight up to her head and lit her brains with thousands of weird and unexpected connections. She felt lightheaded and fuzzy. Somehow through the curtain of I-don’t-give-a-fuck she managed to understand that she was in a seated position, sitting in an old arm-chair. Slowly the reality around her started to mold itself into a living room. A small coffee table right in front of her, an empty bookshelf to her right. Her wrists were aching for all the masturbation, but she couldn’t really help herself. The butane induced serenity was the only thing keeping her from beginning all over. She didn’t even care. She was far out. And for a brief moment she felt better than in months. Life didn’t seem as unbearable when she was high. Nothing was unbearable when she was high. She played with the thought of exhausting her brain of all oxygen and just slipping through the sweet haze that would carry her off the edge of time and space and into the infinite, calm bliss of death, but somehow it made her feel uneasy. Not yet. Not just yet, she thought to herself as her fingers slid across the vast plains of her smooth skin.."

Junkyard Shaman.title: I Was Never Anywhere
Junkyard Shaman.about: Things I made before and after the European tour full of noise and screaming and sitting in a car for endless hours. I enjoyed every second of it. The blurry cover picture is the Baltic Sea, somewhere between Germany and Denmark, early in the morning. Not to say it is a HD picture, but it's more of a representation of a state of mind.

Junkyard Shaman.title: Sunroot
Junkyard Shaman.about: Some songs in some experimenting tunings.

trackinfo.title: Breathe In
trackinfo.lyrics:
No more flesh
in which I suffer
These last thoughts
Pave way for my terminal breath.

Breathe in
Breathe out.

What am I
If not a construction of these thoughts
a heap of words
and lines of letters.

Breathe in
Breathe out.

I'm an image in your head
Hallucination from an oxygen overdose
Just visions of your bored mind
You perceive, I exist.

Breathe in
Breathe out.

trackinfo.title: Dirt Is a Quiet Root
trackinfo.lyrics:
Dig a hole for a bug
Make the kid watch it wither
I protect your work
Worms bloom on her manure

Ripe fruit beneath the ground
they could thrive with light.
Give peace, then.
Dirt is a quiet root.

Dead soil
like some secret yard.
No path through
you must cut off his hand.
Sacrifice the bleeding one.
As the vines grow,
as new sprouts emerge
Man is laid to rest
in the dead soil.

Ripe fruit beneath the ground
they could thrive with light.
Give peace, then.
Dirt is a quiet root.

trackinfo.title: To The Sun
trackinfo.lyrics:
Words can only do harm
speaking in full sentences
inflicts the damage upon
those who already suffer
in their silence.

The bombs fall down
shadow the cities soon to be gone
We laugh and rejoice
and join our hands in the sun..

Words are tools for the war
fuel for the fire 
that burns like napalm
death laughs as we march
on with our peace rallies
the weak are crushed under our feet..

trackinfo.title: Drowning in the Sand
trackinfo.lyrics:
There's a red light
I spew from my throat
and if I could be kind
You'd still be around
But the hatred in my eyes
keeps you at bay
And I get to keep my solitude
it's all that I need...

As the gods grave grows shut
I watch the clouds sail the sky
And if I could have regret
you could see it in my eyes
But things are how they are
And I am what I am
There's no redemption down here
When you're drowning in the sand

Life can turn you bitter
If you let it take hold
But as you grow and wither
You can have it your way
Laugh all the way to the grave
make laughter your headstone
Because your suffering won't change
anything at all....

As the gods grave grows shut....

Eikä mua kiinnosta tietää
mitä totuus oikeesti on
koska en koskaan sitä koskettaa voi
kuitenkaan
Olen aistieni vankina
harhatulkintojen varassa

Enkä totuutta hipaista voi lihalla
ei ikuisuutta silmät voi ihailla
